analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
na kusalam na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam nasa āsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
na kusalam na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam no āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca
na kusalam na anāsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam āsava vippayuttam nasa āsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
